optionality_meta.purpose: Represent optional/repeatable LBS objects as metadata without altering SAP-export core structure.
optionality_meta.source: User-provided BDEW table+graphic for 9992 00000 001 8 (Verbrauch ohne Messlokation/Pauschal).
known_gap_vs_bdew: SAP export does not explicitly list TR (9992...1024) or NeLo (9992...1256) as roles; only MaLo role is mapped to LBS_OBJECT_CODE. This augmentation records them as metadata only.

optionality_meta.purpose: Represent optional/repeatable LBS objects as metadata without altering SAP-export core structure.
optionality_meta.source: User-provided BDEW table+graphic for 9992 00000 002 6 (Verbrauch mit einer Messlokation/Standard).
known_gap_vs_bdew: SAP export maps MeLo (ME_BZG=9992...1032), MaLo (MA_BZG=9992...1016) and NeLo (NELO=9992...1256) as LBS_OBJECT_CODE, but does not encode TR (9992...1024) as a dedicated LBS role; it appears only implicitly via meter/device roles.

optionality_meta.purpose: Represent optional/repeatable LBS objects as metadata without altering SAP-export core structure.
optionality_meta.source: User-provided BDEW table+graphic for 9992 00000 003 4 (Erzeugung mit einer Messlokation).
known_gap_vs_bdew: SAP export maps MeLo (9992...1214) and MaLo generation (9992...1066) to LBS_OBJECT_CODE. It does not encode NeLo (9992...1256) and TR nodes (9992...1058/1074) as explicit LBS roles; these are captured here as metadata only.

optionality_meta.purpose: Represent optional/repeatable LBS objects as metadata without altering SAP-export core structure.
optionality_meta.source: User-provided BDEW table+graphic for 9992 00000 004 2 (Erzeugung ohne getrennt gemessene Erzeugung).
known_gap_vs_bdew: SAP export maps MeLo (9992...1214) and both MaLo (9992...1016 consumption, 9992...1066 generation) to LBS_OBJECT_CODE. It does not encode NeLo (9992...1256) and TR nodes (9992...1024/1058/1074) as explicit LBS roles; these are captured here as metadata only.

optionality_meta.purpose: Represent BDEW optional/repeatable LBS objects (0-1, 0-N, 1-N with coupling) as metadata without modifying SAP export core.
optionality_meta.source: User-provided BDEW table+graphic for 9992 00000 006 8 (Verbrauch mit flexibler Hinterschaltung ohne Erzeugung).
known_tension_with_sap_export: The SAP export contains role frequencies (FREQUENCY_MIN/MAX) for internal roles; these do not necessarily match BDEW LBS object multiplicities (e.g., BDEW defines MeLo 1082 and MaLo 1107 as 1..N with equal counts). This block records the BDEW interpretation without modifying SAP core.

reference_rules.rationale: BDEW note: additional reference from MeLo 1082 to MaLo 1107 is required when MeLo 1082 occurs more than once.
BDEW table indicates TR 1149 references Messlokation 1082.

optionality_meta.purpose: Represent BDEW optional/repeatable LBS objects and coupling constraints as metadata without modifying SAP export core.

known_tension_with_sap_export: SAP export frequencies (FREQUENCY_MIN/MAX) are defined on ROLE_ID level and may not align 1:1 with BDEW object-code multiplicities or coupling constraints; this block records the BDEW interpretation additively.

known_tension_with_sap_export: SAP export frequencies (FREQUENCY_MIN/MAX) are kept at 1 to stay close to typical exported MC JSON; repeatability is captured in _lbs_optionality.lbs_objects instead.
